original_text: to make a distinction between the unclean and the clean and between the living creature that may be eaten and the living creature that may not be eaten.
korean_text: 부정하고 정한 것과 먹을 생물과 먹지 못할 생물을 분별한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: to make a distinction between the unclean and the clean
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 것과 정한 것을 구별하기 위해

sentences.original_text: and between the living creature that may be eaten
and the living creature that may not be eaten.
